query.stmt: select bta.apply_id,bta.account,bta.name,bta.sex,spd.name dept_name, bta.birthday,bta.political_status,bta.nation,bta.degree,bta.qualifications,bta.post,bta.duties, decode(bta.leaguer_type,1,'编制人员',2,'非编制人员',3,'类型3',4,'类型4',5,'类型5')leaguer_type, to_char(apply_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') apply_time,bta.card_no,bta.tele_phone,bta.email,bta.reason from bi_trade_apply bta left join sys_p_department spd on bta.dept_id=spd.id where bta.apply_type=[type] and bta.apply_status=[status] <#if user_dept_id??> and bta.dept_id=[user_dept_id] </#if>
query.param: 单位,工号,姓名,性别,出生年月,政治面貌,民族,学历,学位,岗位,职务,编制类型
